name: ai-content-ideator
description: Web app that generates blog post, video, and social media content ideas using AI

scripts.start: echo "Please navigate to either the 'backend' or 'frontend' directories to run the application."
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"

author: AI Content Ideator Team
